verses.roman:
daraśana kari kailuṅ caraṇa vandana
gosāñi-dāsa pūjārī kare caraṇa-sevana

synonyms: daraśana—by visiting; kari—doing; kailuṅ—made; caraṇa—lotus feet; vandana—worship; gosāñi-dāsa—of the name Gosāñi dāsa; pūjārī—priest; kare—does; caraṇa—lotus feet; sevana—service.
translation: When I visited the temple of Madana-mohana, the priest Gosāñi dāsa was serving the feet of the Lord, and I also prayed at the Lord's lotus feet.
